sentences.en: " We must get a good killing lance and always have it on board.
sentences.cn: “ 我们得弄一支能扎死鱼的好长矛,经常放在船上.

sentences.en: Crusader : Lance - Damage over time effect will now stack with other allies.
sentences.cn: Crusader:Lance,持续性伤害的效果将会与队友相加.

sentences.en: Fans watch Lance Armstrong race the prologue trial July 3 in Rotterdam.
sentences.cn: 球迷观看比赛的序幕兰斯阿姆斯特朗计时赛7月3日在鹿特丹.

sentences.en: He leveled a lance at him.
How does a broke - ass guy like Lance lose 50 grand in 30 minutes?
sentences.cn: 像这欠了一屁股债的人怎么会在30分里输掉5万元?

sentences.en: I hurled a lance at him.
It is a painful experience having the boil lanced.
sentences.cn: 将疖子切开是个痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: It was a media event with flowing blood and absurdist overtones ( Lance Morrow )
sentences.cn: 那是一件带有血腥味和荒谬意味的重大媒介事件 ( 兰斯莫罗 )

sentences.en: It was in fact the spearpoint of the German lance.
sentences.cn: 它确实是德国长矛的锋尖.

sentences.en: Lance Corporal Williams officiously ordered them out.
sentences.cn: 一等兵威廉斯越俎代庖地命令他们出去。

sentences.en: That hopeless example had fallen under the lance of the director's criticism.
sentences.cn: 这个不可救药的先生在导演的唇枪舌剑的指责下只好退出.

sentences.en: This force lance has recently fired two such effectors.
sentences.cn: 这件武器最近已经打击过两个受动器了.

sentences.en: Tom broke a lance with Bill yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天汤姆和比尔发生了争论.

words.tran_cn: （19世纪法国的）长矛轻骑兵；枪骑兵；一种四人组的舞
[外科] 小刀，柳叶刀；尖顶窗；小枪

phrases.tran_cn: 自由作家，自由撰搞人；自由骑士

trans.tran_cn: 长矛，标枪，长矛骑兵，[医]柳叶刀，矛状器具
trans.tran_en: a long thin pointed weapon that was used in the past by soldiers riding on horses

trans.tran_cn: 以长矛攻击；用柳叶刀割开；冲进
trans.tran_en: If a boil on someone's body is lanced, a small cut is made in it so that the liquid inside comes out

trans.tran_cn: 用柳叶刀切开，用矛刺穿，投，掷
